content: Consolidated CDA 2.1 and C-CDA on FHIR will be offered August 6-9, 2019 as online classes through HL7 Training and Education. These will be the only C-CDA classes this year. Participants can take one class or both for a package discount. More information at http://www.hl7.org/events/webinar/cda/package/2019/08/. For questions. contact HL7 Director of Education @Sadhana Alangar
